我已阅读并同意: I have read and agree to
请输入手机号或邮箱: Please enter your phone number or email
请确保所有必填信息都已填写完整。: Please ensure all required information is filled out completely.
问题已提交成功，感谢您的反馈: Problem submitted successfully, thank you for your feedback
提交失败，请稍后再试: Submission failed, please try again later
一人点击耳机，一人点击手机:
One taps on the headset,
one taps on the phone
请输入新的设备名称: Please Enter a New Device Name
搜索设备中..请将手机靠近耳机: Searching for Devices.. Please Bring Your Phone Close to the Headphones
该蓝牙设备已断开，请重新连接: The Bluetooth Device is Disconnected, Please Reconnect
耳机正在发出声音，点击按钮停止: The Headphones Are Emitting Sound, Click the Button to Stop
蓝牙耳机发出声音便于寻找: Bluetooth headphones make sound easy to find
No Bluetooth Headphone Devices Available for Pairing, Please Wait...
提示：请前往系统设置连接蓝牙: Tip: Please Go to System Settings to Connect Bluetooth
标注功能正在开发中，敬请期待: The annotation feature is under development, stay tuned
声纹识别功能正在开发中，敬请期待: The voiceprint recognition feature is under development, stay tuned
退出页面后，转写内容将不被\n保存，请确认是否退出页面?: Exiting the page will not save the transcribed content, please confirm if you want to exit
暂无音频: No audio available at the moment
需要勾选协议: You need to check the agreement
请在登录前勾选用户协议。: Please check the user agreement before logging in.
登录失败请稍后再试。: Login failed, please try again later.
此设备未找到 Google Play 服务，无法登录！: Google Play services not found on this device, cannot log in!
验证码无效或已过期: The verification code is invalid or has expired
您确定要删除此文件吗？: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
标题和内容不能为空: Title and content cannot be empty
未保存位置信息，无法导航: Location information not saved, cannot navigate
请输入正确的手机号: Please enter a valid phone number
手机号或验证码有误: Phone number or verification code is incorrect
请前往系统蓝牙界面配对并连接蓝牙耳机: Please go to the system Bluetooth interface to pair and connect the Bluetooth headphones
是否退出登录？: Would you like to log out?
请先下载地图软件: Please download the map software first.
欢迎使用豆角APP，为了带给您更好的服务。请您先同意勾选: Welcome to use ObtuneAI APP. To provide you with better service, please agree and check first
想知道什么，来问问我~: Want to know something? Ask me~
设备连接已断开，请重新连接。: Device connection has been disconnected, please reconnect.
戴耳机的人说: The person wearing the headphones says
持手机的人说: The person holding the phone says
该设备未绑定此激活码: This device is not bound to this activation code
激活码已解绑过了: The activation code has already been unbound
激活码错误，请输入正确激活码: Invalid activation code, please enter the correct code
为了确保您能充分享受我们产品的所有功能与服务，请记得完成设备绑定步骤。: To ensure you fully enjoy all the features and services of our product, please remember to complete the device binding step.
查找激活码: 请打开您的耳机盒子，仔细查找并记录下里面的激活码。: Find Activation Code: Please open your earphone case, carefully find and record the activation code inside.
进行绑定: 使用您的手机，按照指引扫描或输入激活码。: Binding: Use your phone to scan or input the activation code according to the instructions.
完成激活: 确认无误后，提交激活码，系统将自动完成设备与您账号的绑定过程。: Complete Activation: After confirming everything is correct, submit the activation code, and the system will automatically complete the binding process between the device and your account.
完成以上步骤后，您的设备将正式激活，可以开始享受更加个性化、便捷的使用体验了。: Once you complete the steps above, your device will be officially activated, and you can start enjoying a more personalized and convenient experience.
暂不支持此类二维码: This type of QR code is not supported
需要绑定二维码才能使用: A QR code must be linked to use
历史记录已包含文件名为:: History already contains a file named:
是否替换此音频。: Do you want to replace this audio?
是否保存当前翻译内容？: Do you want to save the current translation?
点击按钮，开始说话: Click the button to start speaking
为了帮您寻找丢失的蓝牙耳机，我们需要获取您的地理位置权限: To help you find lost Bluetooth earbuds, we need access to your location
当您使用语音翻译等功能时，需要使用麦克风权限: Microphone permission is required when using voice translation and other features
当您在使用绑定设备功能时，需要用到摄像头进行扫描二维码: When using the device pairing feature, the camera is needed to scan QR codes
扫描蓝牙设备、连接蓝牙耳机使用耳机音量显示、数值配置等功能需要蓝牙权限: Bluetooth permission is needed to scan devices, connect earbuds, display volume, and configure settings
为了第一时间告知您耳机位置数据,以及后台录音通知功能等情况，需要开通您的通知授权: To notify you promptly about earbud location and background recording, notification permission is required
您确定要清空所有对话吗？: Are you sure you want to clear all conversations?
加载用户手册失败: Failed to load the user manual
暂无用户手册内容: No content in the user manual
是否要跳转到官方应用？: Do you want to go to the official app?
是否要跳转到商城应用？: Do you want to go to the store app?
双方一人戴耳机，一人使用手机。戴耳机一方说话并翻译后，通过手机播放给对方听，对方: One person wears the earphones while the other uses the phone. The person wearing the earphones speaks and the speech is translated and played to the other person through the phone. Then the other person speaks into the phone, and the translation is played through the earphones to the wearer.
双方各戴一只耳机，我方说话在翻译后会实时在对方耳机中播放，对方说话在翻译后实时在: Both parties wear one earphone each. When I speak, the translated speech is played in real-time to the other person's earphone, and when the other person speaks, the translated speech is played to my earphone in real-time.
双方面对面交流，我方通过手机说话并翻译播放给对方听，接下来对方同样通过手机说话并: Both parties communicate face-to-face. I speak through the phone, and it translates and plays the translation to the other person. Then the other person does the same, speaking through the phone, translating, and playing it back to me, achieving mutual translation communication.
当需要实时收听外语发言，外语电影等时，点击开始按钮，发言人的语言会实时传译到我方: When you need to listen to foreign speeches or foreign movies in real time, click the start button. The speaker's language will be interpreted in real-time into my earphones, and the translated content will be recorded in the software.
参加会议时，点击录音按钮开始记录会议内容，说话内容实时转换成文字，结束后保存并可: During a meeting, click the recording button to start recording the meeting content. The spoken content will be converted into text in real-time, and after finishing, you can save and export the recording file, while also generating an AI meeting summary.
请前往系统设置连接蓝牙设备,若已连接了非认证设备，请先断开非认证设备后再连接: Please go to the system settings to connect a Bluetooth device. If a non-authorized device is already connected, please disconnect it first and then try again.
为了提供更好的产品体验我们必须向您申请以下权限: To provide a better product experience, we need to request the following permissions
用于扫描和连接附近的蓝牙设备，确保耳机与我们的 APP 顺利配对: Used to scan and connect to nearby Bluetooth devices, ensuring smooth pairing of the headset with our app.
用于耳机与我们的APP建立连接: Used to establish a connection between the headset and our app.
扫描和发现附近的蓝牙设备以便进行连接: Used to scan and discover nearby Bluetooth devices for connection.
访问网络用于获取和上传数据: Used to access the network for downloading and uploading data.
获取设备信息和当前网络状态: Used to obtain device information and current network status.
用来保存错误信息和崩溃日志，保证用户的体验: Used to save error information and crash logs, ensuring a better user experience.
stuh_instruction:
Wearer's side:
Speak into earbuds → Phone translates,
plays result via its speaker for the other person.

Other person's side:
Speak near phone → Phone translates,
plays result via earbuds into wearer's ears.
meeting_instruction:
Select the language you want to record,
enable Transcription Mode, and convert
the speaker's words into text in real-time.

After finishing, save and export TXT files and audio files.
bm_instruction:
Two people each wear one earbud.
Speak your own language, and the phone's translation app sends the translated result to the other's earbud in real-time.

★ People can communicate with each other even if they speak different languages.
smi_instruction: Put on your earbuds.The mobile phone will then translate the speaker's speech content in real time and play the translated version to you via the earbuds.
无法进行录音，请跳转到系统设置允许访问麦克风权限: Unable to record. Please go to system settings and allow microphone access.
是否注销账号?: Do you want to log out of your account?
